data.title: تطبيق تحدث التركية
data.description: تحدث التركية بطلاقة عن طريق المحادثات الصوتية الفعالة

created_by.title: Speak
created_by.bio:
I am a freelance ICT advisor / trainer. I spent the last five years of my life delivering technology courses for non-ICT specialists to help them advance firmly and confidently in their professional career by using the ICT tools to get their goals achieved effectively. Working in such environment has refined my skills and qualified me to work as technical advisor, breaking the heavy bridges between technical team and the top management, which added many achievements to the company especially in the fields of training and digital marketing.

My client list includes:
Suez Steel Company - Montrade Agricultural development - Education for Programming and training - ASEC Cement - Coats Group plc - Enppi - Lufthansa - Ideal Standard - El Nahar TV - Sabbour Consulting - DEA Egypt Branches - EVYAP - MOHM - Amer Charity Foundation - YARA International - Technomad Group 

As a trainer, I delivered many training sessions & technical courses like:
- Advanced Excel for HR professionals.
- Creating research documents using Microsoft Word.
- Process Planning and Illustration using Microsoft Visio
- Using various Microsoft technologies in the classroom (Microsoft Sway - Office Mix - Windows 8 - MS Office - Microsoft Learning Suite).
- Teaching with Technology (Official course by Microsoft Educator Network).
- Basic and advanced courses on Microsoft Office applications from different aspects to suit wide range of users.
- Basic programming concepts - Hour of Code (using Kodu - TouchDevelop).
- MOS exam preparation.
- ICDL exam preparation.

I am Microsoft Certified Trainer, certified to teach a bunch of Microsoft Official Courseware.

data.title: Speak Turkish
data.description: Learn Turkish in a very conversational manner. Grammar, Vocabulary and everything in conversation.
